message: Let's get this started, Bob! I'm willing to give you a generous offer to get us out of this quickly.
You're being too generous, I'll take this!
I'm willing to compromise, Bob. Let's meet in the middle and get this over with!
I'm not budging, Alice. You're getting a better deal than I should give you.
I'm not going to back down, Bob. Let's split it 50/50 and call it a day.
You're not getting 50/50, Alice. I'm taking control now.
I'm not giving up, Bob. You're getting closer to the bottom line, but I'm still holding firm.
You're running out of time, Alice. Take it or leave it.
I'm not going to give up now, Bob. I'll take back control and make a final offer.
You're making a mistake, Alice. This is my last offer.
I'm not going to let you walk all over me, Bob. This is my final offer.
You're not taking anything, Alice. I'm taking it all.
